trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> händelse som aktiveras av visual designverktyg som [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], implementerar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"> </xref> gränssnitt.
Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ViewEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en ViewEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>händelse utlöses av designer värden för vissa åtgärder i en kontroll i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a ViewEventHandler delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>händelsen hanterats av en ViewEventHandler delegatmetod som tar en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objekt som parameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a ViewEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen designer klasser implementera vanligtvis inte direkt eller tilldela en ViewEventHandler delegat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>basklass tillhandahåller standard ombud för den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>händelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Anpassad kontroll designers åsidosätta den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>metoder för att bearbeta dessa händelser för kontrollen i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>metoden anger händelsedelegeringen standard för de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>Delegera.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>
